author: jdcasey
msg: bumping plexus-interpolator to 1.4 (will be sync'ed to central soon now), and streamlining some more code, including adding a new configuration interpolator to take advantage of the reflective interpolation mechanism in the new model interpolator for the purposes of interpolating Xpp3Doms (plugin configs).

author: bago
msg: This is a third party dependency from Sun we already have in other projects.
The pom declared javax.mail 1.4.1 as a dependency and the stage included javax.mail 1.4 so this was not correct.
